title: How will you describe the role of a teacher and learner in a learner-centered classroom? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any person who has spent even one year in a classroom ought to be able to answer this. Even a small child who has been in school for a week would be able to recognize and speak to the roles of both parties. Your instructor has provided an embarrassingly simple question for you to answer. I expect your instructors are looking for original work, and not work plagiarized from the Quora community. Plagiarized work is particularly disgraceful when done by an educator. If you cannot do something as easy as answering this question yourself, the classroom environment is not for you.
I have put together a table to demonstrate the likely ways that learner and teacher roles would be manifested. I hope it is of use to you.
